snippet: Top prize in the Electrolux Design Lab competition this year went to floating spheres that freshen the air.
abstract: Aeroball, winner of 2012 Electrolux Design Lab competition, is combination air filter-and-freshener comprised of luminous hovering spheres, suspended by the competing forces of gravity and helium.
lead_paragraph: Top prize in the Electrolux Design Lab competition this year went to floating spheres that freshen the air.

headline.seo: An Air Filter Cleans and Freshens as It Floats
headline.print_headline: Prize Winner: Spheres That Juggle 2 Tasks
